description: two men seated on short wall, facing one another, in foreground; other figures lying on wall in background; printed in grey, tan, black and blue
marks:
Signature, Inscription and Stamp

on back, in pe LRC, in the print: [A L]
provenance: Claude Roger-Marx (1888-1977), Paris. [Richard Reed Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago, until 1998; sold in April for LTO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1998-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Coupers de bouts de cigares
